models.factories

Class EnclosureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.factories.EnclosureFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BearEnclosureFactory, EagleEnclosureFactory, FishEnclosureFactory, PenguinEnclosureFactory, SharkEnclosureFactory, TigerEnclosureFactory, WhaleEnclosureFactory, WolfEnclosureFactory

    public abstract class EnclosureFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected EnclosureFactory()
      Constructor for the EnclosureFactory Protected accessibility as we do not want anyone to instantiate this class (Singleton), only the concrete factories

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Enclosure createEnclosure(boolean populate)
      Abstract method to create a typed enclosure, which will later be implemented in each children factory
      static EnclosureFactory getInstance(int type)
      Allows to retrieve the instance of the EnclosureFactory (Singleton) Will create a new instance on first call

        Constructor for the EnclosureFactory Protected accessibility as we do not want anyone to instantiate this class (Singleton), only the concrete factories

    • Method Detail

      • createEnclosure

        public abstract Enclosure createEnclosure(boolean populate)
        Abstract method to create a typed enclosure, which will later be implemented in each children factory
        Parameters:
        populate - Whether the created enclosure should be populated or not
        Returns:
        The newly created enclosure

      • getInstance

        public static EnclosureFactory getInstance(int type)
        Allows to retrieve the instance of the EnclosureFactory (Singleton) Will create a new instance on first call
        Parameters:
        type - The id of the desired type of Animal, which is defined in the AnimalTypes enum
        Returns:
        The EnclosureFactory instance
